div.p:
We are going to move the WiFi buses from Rush Hill & Benton City around 2:30 p.m. on Friday, April 10. They will return on Monday morning.
If anyone needs WiFi over the weekend you can still use the fire station in Laddonia or come to the school parking lot.
Parents and Students- We hope you are doing well as you navigate home-based learning. Here's some information from DESE about how to support your student at home. #WeAreCommUNITY #CommunityCares
Virtual Spirit Week-Friday-Show your Trojan Pride! Post a Pic. #WeRCommUNITY #CommunityCares #WeMissYou #TrojanPride

Do you need something to read? Check out Junior Library Guild. No username or password needed. Just click on Elementary, Middle School or High School stream to get started!
https://www.juniorlibraryguild.com/at-home
